**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-31T03:34:39Z" title="08/31/2015 03:34  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 31, 2015</time> by ExplorerKlatt**

Hey, looks good! I've seen a couple of these deployed before, but never watched a live fire. I think it would be something awesome to see. Don't they have a humveee mounted version of this as well? That might be an interesting build. Have a good one!
I think you could cram way more missiles in it (US military unoffical Moto: More firepower!)

> 
> The truck is inspired by Uzric's ZRC-Trailer

Wow, someone actually did something using another thing I did before as inspiration.

My job in this forum is done. I feel complete.
